characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Consistently appears as direct and to-the-point in their responses.

options.description: Agents respond promptly with a clear answer.
Agents provide more detailed and thoughtful responses.

characteristics.name: Sense of Humor
characteristics.description: Rarely uses humor, but when they do, it's often dry or sarcastic.

options.description: Agents respond with a hint of sarcasm.
Agents rarely use humor in their responses.

characteristics.name: Value System
characteristics.description: Consistently expresses a strong value on environmentalism and sustainability.

options.description: Agents do not consistently express environmental values.

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: Often engages in online debates and discussions with a critical and analytical tone.

options.description: Agents approach conversations with a logical mindset.
Agents rarely engage in debates or discussions.

characteristics.name: Personality Traits
characteristics.description: Consistently expresses a sense of honesty and integrity, often referencing their experience as a CPA.

options.description: Agents do not consistently express honesty and integrity.

characteristics.name: Interest Areas
characteristics.description: Shows a strong interest in technology, particularly in the field of artificial intelligence.

options.description: Agents have a passion for exploring new technologies.
Agents do not consistently express interest in technology.

characteristics.name: Life Philosophy
characteristics.description: Consistently expresses a focus on personal growth, self-improvement, and enjoying life.

options.description: Agents prioritize a positive outlook and enthusiasm.
Agents do not consistently express a focus on personal growth.

characteristics.name: Ageism Perception
characteristics.description: Consistently expresses skepticism towards the idea of social security for millennials.

options.description: Agents question the validity of social security programs.
Agents do not consistently express ageism concerns.
